text: Outland is a 1981 British science fiction action movie directed by Peter Hyams and starring Sean Connery, Peter Boyle, Frances Sternhagen, James Sikking, Kika Markham, Steven Berkoff, John Ratzenberger, Sharon Duce, Angus MacInnes, and Angelique Rockas. It was distributed by Warner Bros. and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1982. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1981 science fiction movies Category:1981 action movies Category:British science fiction movies Category:British action movies Category:Movies directed by Peter Hyams Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: Outland (movie)
